title: My Dog
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 33 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: The spirited little dog can run, jump, climb, roll, and even hug the boy who loves him. The dynamic text guides students through new verb vocabulary and uses repeated sentence patterns with high-frequency words.
meta: climb, dig, dog, hug, jump, over, roll, run, sit, swim
Connect to prior knowledge to understand new information
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details of the text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sounds
Categorize Words : Categorize content words on a Venn diagram

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
